definition: A professional who studies and investigates ancient human history, civilizations, and artifacts through excavation, analysis, and interpretation. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who specialize in unearthing and researching archaeological remains.

examples.german: Die Archäologin hat einen alten Schatz entdeckt.
examples.english: The archaeologist (female) has discovered an ancient treasure.

examples.german: Der Archäologe arbeitet eng mit Historikern zusammen.
examples.english: The archaeologist works closely with historians.

examples.german: Die Archäologin hat eine Ausgrabung in Ägypten geleitet.
examples.english: The archaeologist (female) led an excavation in Egypt.

examples.german: Der Archäologe hat eine bedeutende Entdeckung gemacht.
examples.english: The archaeologist made a significant discovery.
